traits.name: Two Heads
entries: The Angry has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks and on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, or knocked {@condition unconscious}.

traits.name: Rising Anger
entries: If another creature deals damage to the Angry, the Angry's attack rolls have advantage until the end of its next turn, and the first time it hits with a hook attack on its next turn, the attack's target takes an extra 19 ({@damage 3d12}) psychic damage.
On its turn, the Angry has disadvantage on attack rolls if no other creature has dealt damage to it since the end of its last turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The Angry makes two hook attacks.

actions.name: Hook
entries: Melee atk +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 16 (2d12 + 3 damage) piercing damage.
